section.p: You plant yourself beside the mat where they’re sitting. ‘Get up, you dogs, so I can whip you off to hell.’
They get unsteadily to their feet, all the worse for drink. ‘Aye, aye, skipper,’ says your former mate, Mister Fryer. ‘And we’ll be happy to take you with us.’

If you have the codeword Aid .
Otherwise .
